element-description.name: xdoc:transform

description.para: Reference to the actual transformation. Relative names are resolved against the location of the source document.
This file's extension determines whether an XProc 1.0 (extension: .xpl) or an XSLT (extension: .xsl) is done.
A value that starts with $xdoc is assumed to be an xtpxlib-xdoc built-in transformation (e.g. href="$xdoc/code-docgen.xpl"). See also .
Often transformations specify additional attributes on the xdoc:transform element to parametrize their functionality. Any additional attribute is allowed here.

element-description.additional-text-coded-description: Usually an <xi:include> element to load the data for the transformation.
